Description:
The ghostly sailors of this area are cleaning the deck and attending the ropes, but all of them keep the distance with a cannon that seems to be loaded. 

It is aimed directed to a cabin at the stern of the ship. It is as if the canon is calling you.

You wonder if the sailors are ignoring it on purpose or they really don’t know about it.
DescriptionAction: Do you wish to hear the canon’s roar?

    "SSCRewardText": "Firing a cannon is a complex task, and this particular model has some tricks that you need to learn in order to use it properly. But teamwork makes the dream work, and after training with the cannon for a while, you are able to load and unload it with great precision! \r\n\nOn the final try, you aim the cannon and fire it to see how far the cannonball can go, but at the last second, the cannon breaks and fires at one of the ship’s cabins. \r\n\nWhat seemed like a stroke of bad luck at first quickly turns into a lucky break when it reveals that the cabin was none other than the treasure chamber!",

    "SSRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Nenukil): “This ship is equipped with a rare batch of experimental cannons that were only in service for a few years centuries ago. I read that they discovered the power of these cannons was so high that if the ship wasn't properly built, it might disassemble itself while firing! Ha ha, can you imagine? Clearly not a dwarf product. Let’s shoot that cabin out there. If I’m right, with this setup, the cannon should erase one of its walls!”\r\n\nNenukil fires the cannon, and the explosion reveals a treasure chamber! \r\n\nIt seems that Lady Luck is on your side today.",
